hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The user account of an smtp service (default gmail) to use for sending mail

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EMAIL_FROM
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name that should be displayed as the outbound account. If not supplied, this is the same as the email address provided.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER_PASSWORD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Password for the gmail account used to send mail

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export oldpassword=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep smtp-server | grep mail-smtp-gmail | grep -oP 'password(\S)*' | cut -d \" -f 2` export olduser=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep smtp-server | grep mail-smtp-gmail | grep -oP 'username(\S)*' | cut -d \" -f 2` export oldfrom=`cat /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml | grep mail-session | grep 'jboss/mail/gmail' | grep -oP 'from(\S)*' | cut -d \" -f 2`
sed -i "s/$oldpassword/$OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER_PASSWORD/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml sed -i "s/$olduser/$OUTBOUND_EMAIL_USER/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml sed -i "s/$oldfrom/$EMAIL_FROM/g" /usr/local/docker-config/wildfly/standalone.xml
